example.ofsm.xml

00001 <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
00002 <finite-state-machine xmlns="http://ofsm.sourceforge.net">
00003     <definitions>
00004         <states>
00005             <state>
00006                 <name>Awaiting</name>
00007             </state>
00008             <state>
00009                 <name>Processing</name>
00010             </state>
00011             <state>
00012                 <name>Rejected</name>
00013             </state>
00014             <state>
00015                 <name>Accepted</name>
00016             </state>
00017         </states>
00018         <events>
00019             <event>
00020                 <name>ReceivedRequest</name>
00021             </event>
00022             <event>
00023                 <name>ChargingRequest</name>
00024             </event>
00025             <event>
00026                 <name>CancelRequest</name>
00027             </event>
00028         </events>
00029     </definitions>
00030     <initial-state>Awaiting</initial-state>
00031     <transitions>
00032         <transition>
00033             <when-event>ReceivedRequest</when-event>
00034             <from-state>Awaiting</from-state>
00035             <to-state>Processing</to-state>
00036         </transition>
00037         <transition>
00038             <when-event>CancelRequest</when-event>
00039             <from-state>Processing</from-state>
00040             <to-state>Rejected</to-state>
00041         </transition>
00042         <transition>
00043             <when-event>ChargingRequest</when-event>
00044             <from-state>Processing</from-state>
00045             <to-state>Accepted</to-state>
00046         </transition>
00047     </transitions>
00048 </finite-state-machine>
